author.name: Click here to visit HorizonsBot's GitHub

title: Server Rules
description: Imaginary Horizons is an community that values dignity, creativity, and diversity. Here are our server's rules:

fields.name: Give the Benefit of the Doubt
fields.value: Always be prepared to see a conflict as a misunderstanding and don't intentionally pick fights. Whenever possible, try to hash out misunderstandings in private messages instead of in public chats.

fields.name: No Ridicule/Verbal Abuse
fields.value: We value diversity of opinion and expression in this server. Attacking or making fun of people is not productive. This rule includes excessive self-deprecation, unreciprocated trash talk, as well as bigoted terms of any kind.

fields.name: Start Discussions in the Appropriate Channel
fields.value: Please post in appropriate channels so we can keep discussion organized. If you can't find a good channel to post in, check the Channel and Roles Browser at the top of the channel list to see if you can opt-in. If you still can't find a good channel, you can /petition for one to be made.

fields.name: Discord Usage Tips
fields.value:
- Start your message with `@silent` to prevent it from waking people up in the middle of the night.
- Surround text with `||` to mark it a spoiler. ||example||
